networking

Class BigPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • networking.DataPacket
      • networking.BigPacket

  • public class BigPacket
extends DataPacket
    This class is a viritual DataPacket. It may exceed the 1024 size limit and thus cannot be sent. The constructor takes all header fields and the data.
    Since:
    2014-04-08
    Version:
    1.0-b
    Author:
    Sander Koning

      • Fields inherited from class networking.DataPacket

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigPacket

        public BigPacket(byte source,
         byte destination,
         byte hops,
         byte sequencenr,
         byte[] data,
         java.lang.Boolean ack,
         java.lang.Boolean routing,
         java.lang.Boolean keepalive,
         java.lang.Boolean more)
        Parameters:
        source - The source
        destination - The destination
        hops - Number of hops
        sequencenr - Sequencenumber to identify packets
        data - Array of bytes with raw data
        ack - The packet is an ack
        routing - The packet is meant for routing
        keepalive - The packet is a keep alive signal
        more - Should be set if the packet with sequencenumber + 1 is part of this packet
